title: Pronunciation of Ibadillahis saaliheen... affect my prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: lotifah says if i make a mistake and or is in arabic called the letter a lamb so loved allah if what's before it is with a kasra then you say this is a moroccan and making a mistake in it does not invalidate or impact your prayer so whether you say ibadillahi or ibaadillahi this it is still valid and correct
